SEARCH

Class Huffman

java.lang.Object
Huffman
public class Huffman extends Object
The Huffman class represents a Huffman encoding algorithm implementation. It provides methods to compress and decompress text using Huffman coding.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Huffman(String text)
    Constructs a Huffman object with the given text.
